file_content.text: Blasted Republic! Is nothing sacred to them? Our home!
Something's not right, Erik. Something very un-warlike going about.
Been in a lot of wars I don't know about, Rhea?
You didn't see? When they stormed our complex, they were together--their soldiers and ours.
I don't think-- It was chaotic, you were scared....
And what about those strange noises, like an animal? I suppose I imagined you leaping out of your skin when you heard them.
